org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.query.filter.expression

Class BooleanLiteral

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.query.filter.expression.Literal<Object>
      • org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.query.filter.expression.BooleanLiteral
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistable, BooleanExpression, Expression<Object>, Filter, GenericExpression, Predicate

    public class BooleanLiteral
extends Literal<Object>
implements BooleanExpression, Predicate
    A literal implementation that evaluates to either true or false.
